p: Sophora flavescens extract was incorporated into PVP nanofibers, and the device was proposed as antimicrobial air filtration [ 118]. Filtration and antimicrobial performances of the PVP-based nanofiber filter were evaluated, employing S. epidermidis bioaerosols as test airborne particles; the results displayed excellent antimicrobial activity and highly effective air filters (99.99% filtration efficiency).
